attributes.action: Close down this petition site before it drives us all to distraction!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am sick of being inundated with emails from people to sign petitions hosted here relating to various things - many of which cannot be properly answered by a simple yes/no (sign it/don't sign it).  Please sign up here to petition the government to rid us of this nuisance and tell us to talk to out MPs - that's what they are there for!

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
